text: Excellent service! The staff was incredibly helpful and the product quality exceeded my expectations. Will definitely be back!
Very disappointed with the customer service. Had to wait 45 minutes just to get assistance. The staff seemed overwhelmed and unorganized.
Good selection of products and reasonable prices. The checkout process was smooth. Only wish they had more parking spaces available.
Amazing experience! The new layout makes it so easy to find everything. Staff is knowledgeable and friendly. Great job on the renovation!
Worst shopping experience ever. The store was dirty, products were misplaced, and the staff was rude. Will not be returning.
Average experience. Found what I needed but nothing special. Prices are competitive but service could be improved.
Great store with helpful staff. The online ordering system works well. Only downside is limited weekend hours.
Exceptional customer service! They went above and beyond to help me find the right product. Highly recommend this location.
Product was out of stock despite website showing availability. No one bothered to call ahead. Wasted trip and time.
